title: About
text:
About Me
Greetings, my name is Yash Dhore. I am a high school student who enjoys coding in my free time. I am learning java and R currently and hope to broaden my knowledge about programming languages.
Feel free to contact me by email: yash@dhore.com
Questions, comments, and concerns about this project are welcome!

title: AP Exam Volume
text:
The volume of AP exams per year increased over time and is higher in larger states with more urban areas. The following data was pulled from the College Board Data Archive. Mapping data was then used to visualize the volume of AP exams by state from 2010 to 2020. Surprisingly, throughout the years, the top six states with highest AP exam volumes accounted for more than half of the nationwide exam volume.
You can hover the cursor over the states on the plot to display extra information. Note that the values displayed while hovering your cursor on the map do not update during animation if the cursor stays on the same state.

title: AP Program Participation
text: This page contains four graphs that show the annual AP program participation from 1956 to 2020.

title: AP Program Participation (continued)
text:
This page contains four graphs that display the annual AP program participation by year along with a regression line.
You can hover the cursor over the points on the plot to display extra information.

title: Colleges and Universities
text:
These two plots display the top 25 colleges and universities in 2020. Ranking was determined by the total number of students that sent an AP score and the total number of AP scores the college or university received that year. A higher number of students or AP scores received corresponds with a higher ranking.
You can hover the cursor over the points on the plot to display extra information.

title: AP Exams
text:
This plot visualizes the 2020 AP exams by their mean score and the number of students who took the exam.
You can hover the cursor over the points on the plot to display extra information.

title: AP Scholar Awards
text:
This map shows the distribution of AP Scholar awards in the Untied States for the year 2020.
You can hover the cursor over the states on the plot to display extra information.
